original_text: If you warn a person who is proud, he will insult you. If you tell a wicked person that he is wrong, he will hurt you. If you warn a person who is proud, he will insult you. If you tell a wicked person that he is wrong, he will hurt you.
korean_text: 거만한 자를 징계하는 자는 도리어 능욕을 받고 악인을 책망하는 자는 도리어 흠이 잡히느니라

sentences.original_text: If you warn a person who is proud
If you tell a wicked person that he is wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 악한 사람에게 그가 틀렸다고 말한다면

sentences.original_text: If you warn a person who is proud
If you tell a wicked person that he is wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 악한 사람에게 그가 틀렸다고 말한다면
